channel.title: Auxy Producers Label?
channel.description: Hey. I’m an Auxy user since around 2016 and only really started to make solid house/trap tracks such as “SELEKTA” or “404” under my alias: “2080-FC”. But this isn’t about me. I was wondering if someone, somewhere has ever created some sort of platform/label where Auxy users can submit their work for others working on the label to publish to an audience? I feel like a team of ppl could make this happen and it’d really benefit artists starting out. If you’re interested in this dm me @ 2080-fc on Instagram.

item.title: Auxy Producers Label?

item.description:
five is taking a little break rn, we’re opening submissions back up in the summer tho so feel free to submit then!

item.title: Auxy Producers Label?
item.dc:creator: KRISW
item.description:
Hey. I’m an Auxy user since around 2016 and only really started to make solid house/trap tracks such as “SELEKTA” or “404” under my alias: “2080-FC”.
But this isn’t about me.
I was wondering if someone, somewhere has ever created some sort of platform/label where Auxy users can submit their work for others working on the label to publish to an audience?
I feel like a team of ppl could make this happen and it’d really benefit artists starting out.
If you’re interested in this dm me @ 2080-fc on Instagram.

Read full topic
